title: Allow loading and saving ExternalTools XML from different locations
author: codearoo
body_snippet: I can save and open the connections XML, but not the External Tools one. I like to keep my connections XML in a synced folder (like OneDrive or GoogleDrive) but apparently I can't do that with my External Tools.
